title: Riot support thinks security is a joke
body:
https://imgur.com/gallery/yEw8m2x
Like I said in the comments, if you guys are joking, this means you aren't taking the security of the users' identities seriously.
If not, well, then that means we know that you think that knowing how to play a champion is more important than knowing how to keep your identity, money, and assets safe.
Choose.
